name: VODKA (itch)
description:
“VODKA” is a social game 

Consider it as a literary work, which will tell you about harm of this drink.

Dont drink vodka – play “Vodka”!

Our main character, Boris, goes into Earth orbit to defeat a horde of enemies, but he has only a bottle of russian vodka as a weapon. Real hero!

Features :
  •  40 degrees of alcohol directly on your monitor
  •  Russian spirit and nice soundtrack
  •  Various types of enemies and bonuses
  •  Perhaps this game will help your children not to become alcoholics
Controls:
  • A/D - move
  • LMB - shoot
  • also , as a cosmonaut you can do jump and doublejump (W) and make a dash (double A or D )
